divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and i were having a party inside. We had partied for about 2 hours when we heard a ear splitting screeching noise. We ran outside to the field next to my pond. Half in and out of the pond was a giant disk. It was a like a metalic color it never stayed one color for to long. Then there was a giant flash of light next thing i remember my friends and i saw six bipedial humonoid benings doing reprodution expirements on us. Then i woke up in my house and it was 4:oo a.m we haven't realy talked about it since I have inclosed my email address so that any who are curious can contact me:thefrikinshizz@yahoo.com
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around January 30th 2008
Summary: giant disk with rotating light patterns round the edge probalbly 50 ft.
